\.\c[3]With that, Shin put the handle bar where it would
\.\c[3]And what came out...\.\. left me speechless.
\n<Weird Guy>\."Now if you would please go gather everyone!"
\n<Kugie>\."Before we do any of that, just who are you?"
\n<Botsun>\."I am \c[2]Botsun\c[0]. I am your floor master for this evening."
\n<Botsun>\."Don’t do anything bad! I’m always watching!"
\n<Botsun>\."Now please get everyone here der everyone’s collar
\n<Mai>\."Eeek! We get it! Let’s go get them."
